---
title: is_charging_cell
description: Determines whether the cell is of type CHARGING_CELL.
---

## Signature

```py
def is_charging_cell() -> bool
```

## Description

Returns `True` if the cell is of type `CHARGING_CELL`, otherwise returns `False`.  
This method is typically used to check if a cell provides recharge functionality.

## Example

```py
# The cell is a CHARGING_CELL
print(cell.is_charging_cell())
# Output: True
 
# The cell is not a CHARGING_CELL
print(cell.is_charging_cell())
# Output: False
```
